english.segment1: My Jesus, I need You now. May Your grace look my way. To hear You sing over me. Make Your desires and mine the same
english.segment2: Bless me indeed. Open wide my horizons to share Your name. Bless me indeed. Let Your hand keep me from harm and pain. Bless me, Bless me
english.segment3: Lord I cling to Your heart. Your love is what I need. All great things come from You. May Your greatness fall on me
english.segment4: Bless me indeed. Open wide my horizons to share Your name. Bless me indeed. Let Your hand keep me from harm and pain. Bless me, Bless me
english.segment5: The Lord bless and keep you. May His face shine upon you. And be gracious and give you peace
english.segment6: Bless me indeed. Open wide my horizons to share Your name. Bless me indeed. Let Your hand keep me from harm and pain. Bless me. Bless me. Bless me. Bless me. Bless me. Bless me. Bless me..
